summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackClarins' Velvet Hydrating Cleansing Milk is a creamy, cleansing milk that melts away makeup, impurities and pollutants while boosting hydration and preserving the skin's natural microbiota. Leaves skin feeling soft, clean, hydrated, and incredibly comfortable
details: DetailsBenefitsGently removes makeup and pollutants while boosting hydrationLeaves skin soft, clean, hydrated, and comfortablePreserves a healthy balance of the skin's microbiotaSafe for use on face, eyes, and lipsDermatologist- and ophthalmologist-tested. Colorant-free.Key IngredientsOrganic Golden Gentian* and Organic Lemon Balm extracts* Soothes and softens the skin for an ultra-gentle cleansing experienceMoringa extract helps detoxify skin by eliminating pollutantsNatural Humectants boost the skin's natural hydration*Organic ingredients are produced in accordance with European regulation (CE 2018/848).Research Results96% Comfortable skin*95% Soft, silky skin*93% Makeup is completely removed**Satisfaction test - 110 women - after 14 days of useItem 2620949How To UseWarm Velvet Cleansing Milk between hands and smooth over face, eyes and lips, from the center working outward. Remove with water or wipe with a tissue and follow with Toning Lotion if desired.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Propanediol, C14-22 Alcohols, Polysorbate 60, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, Parfum/Fragrance, Sodium Citrate, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, T-Butyl Alcohol, Gentiana Lutea Extract, Maltodextrin, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract [V3544A].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Warm Velvet Cleansing Milk between hands and smooth over face, eyes and lips, from the center working outward. Remove with water or wipe with a tissue and follow with Toning Lotion if desired.

reviews.headline: Did not know it's an exfoliating/Caused bad skin reaction
reviews.comments: I wasn't aware that this was an exfoliating product. It is advertised as a gentle milky cleanser for sensitive skin not an exfoliant. On the 4th day using this  I had a severe allergic reaction.  My eyes were so puffy, and I didn't even use to remove eye makeup. My skin has welts and is so red an itchy and painful. If your skin is sensitive do not buy. Also, it should specifically say on the bottle that it is a chemical exfoliant. There is Citric acid listed.

reviews.headline: To oily
reviews.comments: Love Clarins, but this face wash didnt work. It was oily and didnt lather up. Left my skin feeling not clean.

reviews.headline: Nice but no
reviews.comments: I have skincare from this brand that i love so i decided to try this. I did like that it made my face feel soft but it was maybe too oily because my face didnt feel clean after using it. It also did not remove all my makeup. I ended up returning it.

reviews.headline: Exceptional!
reviews.comments: This creamy cleanser is so gentle, soothing and cleansing. I forgot how good Clarins products are! Would def buy again.

faceoff_positive.comments: I am  Clarins fan because all their products are works with natural ingredients is a plus for me.
faceoff_positive.headline: It's really helped my skin become more healthier

faceoff_negative.comments:
I am a loyal customer of Clarins for over 30 years.  I love ALL of your products and the only skincare products I have used in these 30 plus years.

My complaint is not the product "Velvet Cleansing Milk" but the new container.—the top will not snap closed.  The blue milk cleanser that I used for years had a screw on top—no problem.  I have been trying to snap it closed for 5 minutes now and I have given up.  This was true of the bottle I just finished.  I was smart enough to have bought bottles of the blue milk cleaner so I didn't know the new one would be SUCH A PAIN!!!  It's sooooo frustrating! 

 Please use the original container.  It's not worth the few pennies you might be saving.  Your products are excellent.  Please don't lower your standards by using cheap and inferior  storage containers.

Knowing your standards of excellence and customer satisfaction, I am confident that this matter will be addressed..
faceoff_negative.headline: Frustrated
